titles.title: CB 113 Behold What Manner of Man is This
He's the Lord of Glory

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
BEHOLD WHAT MANNER OF MAN IS THIS,
Who stands 'twixt God and man?
His eyes are as a flame of fire,
His fan is in His hand.
John saw Him in the seven churches
As the Sun in brilliancy.
Behold what manner of man is this?
What manner of man is He?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He's the Lord of Glory, He is the great I Am,
The Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end.
His name is Wonderful, the Prince of Peace is He.
He's the Everlasting Father, throughout eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Behold what manner of man is this,
Who spake to the woman at the well?
Everlasting life I'll give to thee,
Far richer than man can tell.
And whosoever shall drink of the well
Shall live eternally.
Behold what manner of man is this?
What manner of man is He?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Behold what manner of man is this,
Who spake to the maimed and halt?
He says, "Thy sins be forgiven thee,
Take up thy bed and walk."
He stands as the mighty Healer now,
And He cries, "Come unto Me!"
Behold what manner of man is this?
What manner of man is He?
